ComicInfo.Title: Anathema Calling
ComicInfo.Summary:
The death of a childhood friend sparks a series of events that lead Addison from teenage field hockey player to a murderer of criminals. There's no lack of targets for her in a city built on corruption, but payback doesn't come for free. Addison's reality begins to blur in the pursuit of vengeance and justice is used as justification to become a monster.
The stunning first full comic work from Eisner award nominated creator Mia Goodwin (Princeless), perfect for fans of Batgirl or Spider-Gwen! Features a limited edition variant by Jennifer Ely (Boxtrolls), limited to 2,000 copies.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mia Goodwin | 1 | Var | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Jennifer Ely | 2 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Addison Brody, Anthony Brody, Detective Tico, Jessica Daniels
